meanings.definition: A person who argues or debates.
meanings.sent1: The disputers in the room were loudly discussing their opinions.
meanings.sent2: She is known as one of the top disputers in the debate club.
meanings.sent3: The two disputers were so engrossed in their argument that they didn't notice the time.
meanings.sent4: The disputers clashed like two mighty warriors on the battlefield of ideas.
meanings.sent5: The image of the disputers passionately debating stayed in my mind long after the event.
